nodes.documentation:
@title AOPool
 * This contract acts as the exchange between AO and ETH/ERC-20 compatible tokens
nodes.name: AOPool

nodes.documentation:
Event to be broadcasted to public when a seller sells AO
	 * If erc20CounterAsset is true, the Lot is priced in an ERC20 compatible token.
Otherwise, the Lot is priced in Ethereum
nodes.name: LotCreation

buyWithEth(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Buyer buys AO from Pool `_poolId` with Ethereum

params._quantity: The amount of AO to be bought

params._adminAddress: The new admin address to set

params._erc20CounterAsset: Type of the Counter-Asset				true = Pool is priced in ERC20 compatible Token				false = Pool is priced in Ethereum
params._erc20TokenAddress: The address of the ERC20 Token
params._erc20TokenMultiplier: Used if ERC20 Token needs to deviate from Ethereum in multiplication/division
params._quantityCapAmount: Cap for the amount of AO at any given time that can be available for sale in this Pool
params._quantityCapStatus: Whether or not the Pool has quantity cap				true = has quantity cap				false = no quantity cap
params._sellCapAmount: Cap for the amount of AO that can be put up for sale in this Pool at `_price`
params._sellCapStatus: Whether or not the Pool has sell cap				true = has sell cap				false = no sell cap
params._status: The status of the Pool				true = Pool is live and can be sold into				false = Pool cannot be sold into

lotEthAvailableToWithdraw(bytes32).details: Seller gets Lot `_lotId` (priced in ETH) available to withdraw info
lotEthAvailableToWithdraw(bytes32).return: The amount of ion soldEthereum available to withdraw from the LotCurrent Ethereum withdrawn from the Lot

ownerLotIds(address,uint256,uint256).details: Get list of owner's Lot IDs from `_from` to `_to` index

params._account: The address of the Lot's owner

ownerTotalLot(address).details: Retrieve number of Lots an `_account` has

params._account: The address of the Lot's owner

sell(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Seller sells AO in Pool `_poolId` - create a Lot to be added to a Pool for a seller.

params._quantity: The amount of AO to be sold

setAOIonAddress(address).details: The AO set the AOIonAddress Address

setWhitelist(address,bool).details: Whitelist `_account` address to transact on behalf of others

totalIonWithdrawnBeforeLot(bytes32).details: Get total ion withdrawn from all Lots before Lot `_lotId`
totalIonWithdrawnBeforeLot(bytes32).return: Total ion withdrawn from all Lots before Lot `_lotId`

transferERC20(address,address,uint256).details: Allows TheAO to transfer `_amount` of ERC20 Token from this address to `_recipient`

transferEth(address,uint256).details: Allows TheAO to transfer `_amount` of ETH from this address to `_recipient`

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfer ownership of The AO to new address

params._theAO: The new address to be transferred

params._status: The status to set. true = start. false = stop

params._quantity: The amount of ion to withdraw

devdoc.title: AOPool * This contract acts as the exchange between AO and ETH/ERC-20 compatible tokens
